name: Pat Toomey
speech: Mr. TOOMEY. Mr. President, on the motion to invoke cloture on the House amendment to the Senate Amendment to ', H.R. 1158, ', the Consolidated Appropriations Act, vote No. 427, I had intended to be recorded as voting no. [[', Page S7197, ] (At the request of Mr. Schumer, the following statement was ordered to be printed in the Record.)
